lead_paragraph: Ms. McKay shows the hard edge of a fighter and the tender voice of wistfulness.

headline.print_headline: It’s 1, 2, 3, What Is She Singing For? The Past
headline.main: Review: Nellie McKay Goes Retro to Days of Song and Psychedelia

snippet: Ms. McKay shows the hard edge of a fighter and the tender voice of wistfulness.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert by Nellie McKay at 54 Below.
